Oh, I forgot to answer rAuq's question: I don't know where the 
entrance to the Ark is, its Ryo's ship kinda.

::Killfest/Liono/Dark/EndBringer/Koj/Inu::

Killfest nods, looking up at Dark to see the missile hit its target, 
sending Dark flipping through the air. He feels a shot from Liono 
slam into his chest, sending him flying backwards, firing at Liono 
from his optics.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer grunts, feeling Koj's lance slam into his stomach and then 
feeling another one of his tentacles being cut off. He punches Koj, 
but the impact sends the two bots flying apart.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Koj spins around, blocking Motormaster's attack with his lance but 
then feeling EndBringer slam into him from behind, the bot's arms 
tightening their hold to attempt to crush him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Inu flies out of the Ark, the mechanical dragon looking around. 
Seeing Astroblast approaching, he fires three fireballs at the bot.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Being pushed away by Killfest, Motormaster barely avoids the 
fireball. but
> it dosent avoid his notice. He looks down at Endbringer who is 
engaged with
> the energy absorbing Maximal, "Cover me" he shouts to Killfest, as 
he heads
> down to Koj. As he reaches him he spits "Absorb this" and puts his 
fists
> together for a double ax handle, aiming for the robots head.
